dialogue.title: In the Garden
listen: We have many flowers in the garden.
say: We have many flowers in the garden.

word.title: Here we are. Listen and follow me.

minibook.title: Listen and read.
listen: There was a little dinosaur called, 'Tira.'
Tira played the plains and near some waterfall.s
Tira wondered what was up on the mountain.
She decided to go up to the top.
Tira was scared and ran down to her mom.
Tira's family had to leave their home.

dialogue.title: In the Garden unit 222
listen: Today, we're planting and gardening in the garden.
say: Today, we're planting and gardening in the garden.

word.title: Here we are. Listen and follow me.

minibook.title: Listen and read.
listen: Oh, I need a pot and a shovel.
I need a water pot and soil, too.
First, put a seed into the soil and cover it.
Second, water the seed and see the growing plant.

dialogue.title: Nature and Disaster
say: Let's go up to the top.
Oh, the volcano is about the erupt.
Yes! And we can't go up to the top today.
We should go down now, Daniel.

word.title: Here we are. Listen and follow me.
